body_html: same problem for multiple process run on same GPU, I have some machine with titanx and ubuntu 14 , others with p40 and centos 7, with gpu_options.per_process_gpu_memory_fraction and gpu_options.allow_growth, I can run on titanx machine, but always get CUBLAS_STATUS_NOT_INITIALIZED on p40 machines
